com.tup.commons.csrf

接口 CsrfTokenRepository

  • 所有已知实现类:
    HttpSessionCsrfTokenRepository

    public interface CsrfTokenRepository

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cacheUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      缓存来源的url
      CsrfTokenBean generateToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Generates a CsrfTokenBean
      java.lang.String getRemoveCacheUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      获取并清理来源的url

    • 方法详细资料

      • generateToken

        CsrfTokenBean generateToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Generates a CsrfTokenBean
        参数:
        request - the HttpServletRequest to use
        返回:
        the CsrfTokenBean that was generated. Cannot be null.

      • saveToken

        void saveToken(CsrfTokenBean token,
               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Saves the CsrfTokenBean using the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse. If the CsrfTokenBean is null, it is the same as deleting it.
        参数:
        token - the CsrfTokenBean to save or null to delete
        request - the HttpServletRequest to use
        response - the HttpServletResponse to use

      • loadToken

        CsrfTokenBean loadToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Loads the expected CsrfTokenBean from the HttpServletRequest
        参数:
        request - the HttpServletRequest to use
        返回:
        the CsrfTokenBean or null if none exists

      • cacheUrl

        void cacheUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        缓存来源的url
        参数:
        request - request the HttpServletRequest to use
        response - the HttpServletResponse to use

      • getRemoveCacheUrl

        java.lang.String getRemoveCacheUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        获取并清理来源的url
        参数:
        request - the HttpServletRequest to use
        response - the HttpServletResponse to use
        返回:
        来源url
